title: Susan Brown Poncy, M.D., Named Medical Director of Jupiter Medical Center's Women's Health Program - Florida Hospital News and Healthcare Report
author: Dorron Blumberg
description: Susan Brown Poncy, M.D., has been named Medical Director of the Women's Health Program at Jupiter Medical Center. Dr. Poncy is board certified in obstetrics and gynecology by the [...]
sitename: Florida Hospital News and Healthcare Report
cleaned_text: Susan Brown Poncy, M.D., has been named Medical Director of the Women's Health Program at Jupiter Medical Center. Dr. Poncy is board certified in obstetrics and gynecology by the American Board of Obstetrics and Gynecology. She is also certified in Traditional Chinese Herbal Medicine. Dr. Poncy received her medical degree from the University of Miami School of Medicine, and completed her Residency in Obstetrics and Gynecology at Parkland Memorial Hospital at the University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center in
